title: A Shot of Poison: An Insider's Tales of One of Rock's Most Outrageous Bands
description: A SHOT OF POISON is an unauthorized collection of tales from over twenty years with the outrageous, multi-platinum-selling rock band Poison, based on the personal encounters of author, rock journalist and music industry insider Christopher Long.From Los Angeles, New York and Nashville to Chicago, Las Vegas, Dallas and beyond, A SHOT OF POISON chronicles Long's exploits with the members of this chart-topping group and is chock-full of personal anecdotes, insider stories and behind-the-scenes accounts.From Long's early recollections of first being introduced to the band in the late 1980s to more recent experiences touring as bassist Boby Dall's personal assistant, A SHOT OF POISON offers incredible, never-before published stories, interviews and photos of one of rock's most outrageous groups.Through his personal experiences as an assistant to Poison, Long will allow the reader to become a "fly on the wall," gaining new insight into he behind-the-scenes highs and lows of this legendary band.
author: Christopher     Long
